column4: How can I get my Webcam to show while using skype? I go to the Sesstings and my laptop webcam is not listed
does the webcam work in cheese?
I think I may have a bigger issue it just said if I would like to install these packages(cheese) without verification
so I guess the Key from the Ubuntu servers is messed up
can you give a pastebin of the output of:   sudo apt-get update
you probably added a PPA and not the key
do you want the output of this
I guess not because I still get the same error msg when I do sudo apt-get update
just go for it dude, install the packages
ok installed cheese, ran it and I get no devices found
run:  lsusb    and use the 8 character hex ID to find guides
but it was working before this morning
what is this Windows? LOL. No I really doubt that it will solve the issue as I rebooted it this morning after a software update
